title: Mouse buttons 4/5 not working after "upgrading" to windows 10
body: Logitech mx master, works normally everywhere else. Have tried reinstalling both League and the mx master software.

replies.body:
Unless there is something physically malfunctioning with your mouse, this could be a configuration problem.  My suggestion would be to reset your config in case of any corruption causing the keys to not respond.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Also, make sure that you're binding your keys in the game and not outside/through another software.  Your settings in-game are independent.  

Let me know if that helps!

I tried you solution, since i have the exact same problem but with a razer deathadder, but it didn't work.

Just like Tempesttt i tried multiple things first, and none worked. my mouse also works fine out of the game (I.E to back in windows explorer or on a web page) and i tried to update my razer synapse driver.

I also tried in another game, overwatch, to see if my driver was not somehow only blocking in game key binding, but it worked just fine, so the problem is solely tied to league.

If you have any other tips or steps you could suggest me, i'm all ears.

thanks

Edit: i just tried on the PBE client, same issue
